title: SHARED RESIDENTIAL TENANCY AGREEMENT
PROPERTY DESCRIPTION
ROOM ALLOCATION AND SHARED SPACES
RENT AND PAYMENT TERMS
UTILITIES AND SHARED EXPENSES
HOUSE RULES AND SHARED LIVING GUIDELINES
MAINTENANCE AND REPAIRS
INSURANCE AND LIABILITY
OCCUPANCY CHANGES AND SUBLETTING
body:
OCCUPANCY MODIFICATIONS:

Adding New Tenants:
- Landlord written consent required
- New tenant must pass reference checks
- Lease amendment required
- Additional bond may be required

Tenant Departure:
- {{departure_notice_period}} written notice required
- Remaining tenant(s) may:
  a) Find replacement tenant (subject to landlord approval)
  b) Assume full lease responsibility
  c) Terminate lease (if agreed by all parties)

Subletting Policy:
- Subletting {{subletting_allowed}}
- If allowed, requires:
  * Written landlord consent
  * Subtenant background check
  * Original tenant remains liable
  * Maximum sublet period: {{max_sublet_period}}

Temporary Absence:
- Absence over {{temp_absence_threshold}} days requires notification
- Rent obligation continues during absence
- Utility cost sharing continues

title: INSPECTIONS AND RIGHT OF ENTRY
body:
PROPERTY INSPECTIONS:

Routine Inspections:
- Frequency: {{inspection_frequency}}
- Notice period: {{inspection_notice}} days written notice
- Inspection window: {{inspection_time_window}}
- Inspection checklist provided in advance

Entry Rights:
Landlord may enter premises with appropriate notice for:
- Routine inspections
- Necessary repairs and maintenance
- Emergency situations (immediate entry)
- Showing property to prospective tenants (during final {{showing_period}})
- Property valuations

Tenant Rights:
- Right to be present during inspections
- Right to reschedule inspection once with {{reschedule_notice}} notice
- Right to receive inspection report within {{report_timeframe}} days
- Right to privacy and quiet enjoyment

Entry Notice Requirements:
- Non-emergency entry: {{entry_notice_period}} hours written notice
- Emergency entry: No notice required
- Entry times: Between {{entry_start_time}} and {{entry_end_time}}

title: LEASE TERMINATION CONDITIONS
body:
TERMINATION SCENARIOS:

Fixed Term Lease:
- Natural expiry: {{lease_end_date}}
- Early termination: {{early_termination_conditions}}
- Break lease fee: {{break_lease_penalty}}

Periodic Lease:
- Tenant notice: {{tenant_notice_period}} days
- Landlord notice: {{landlord_notice_period}} days
- No grounds termination: {{no_grounds_notice}}

Termination for Breach:
- Rent arrears: {{rent_arrears_notice}} days notice
- Breach of terms: {{breach_notice_period}} days to remedy
- Serious breach: {{serious_breach_notice}} days notice

End of Tenancy Obligations:
- Professional cleaning: {{cleaning_requirement}}
- Carpet cleaning: {{carpet_cleaning}}
- Repair of tenant damage
- Return all keys and garage remotes
- Provide forwarding address for bond return

Bond Return:
- Timeframe: {{bond_return_timeframe}} days after vacating
- Condition: Property returned in original condition (fair wear excepted)
- Deductions itemized in writing

title: DISPUTE RESOLUTION AND LEGAL MATTERS
